main_definition: A large number or quantity of something.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To receive a large amount of something, usually as a reward or prize
meanings_and_examples.example: She won lots of money in the lottery.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Many things together; a great number
meanings_and_examples.example: There were lots of people at the concert last night.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A considerable amount or sum, especially when referring to money
meanings_and_examples.example: He bought lots of gifts for his family on their anniversary.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To throw with a large movement; scatter in all directions
meanings_and_examples.example: She threw lots of confetti at the wedding reception.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A large quantity, amount or number; multitude
meanings_and_examples.example: The lottery had millions of entries and only a few winners.
